citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm on
03-Sep-19.
At 12:00pm, the APHIS Inspector arrived at the facility and knocked on the door as well as rang the doorbell. When
there was no answer, the Inspector called the licensee and left a voice mail but no return call was received by the
time the Inspector left the facility at 12:35pm.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm on
03-Sep-19.
At 12:00pm, the APHIS Inspector arrived at the facility and knocked on the door as well as rang the doorbell.  When
there was no answer, the Inspector called the licensee and left a voice mail but no return call was received by the
time the Inspector left the facility at 12:35pm.
